name: The Council of European Professional Informatics Societies
membership: European e-Skills Association, CEN Workshop on ICT Skills, CEN/PC 428, Conference of INGOs of the Council of Europe
goal: The Council of European Professional Informatics Societies (CEPIS) is a non-profit organisation seeking to improve and promote a high standard among informatics professionals in recognition of the impact that Informatics has on employment, business and society.
interests: Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Digital Agenda for Europe, New Skills for New Jobs, Youth on the Move, Opening up Education, Agenda for New Skills and Jobs
